func:
var inv_cap=flow.get("INV_CAPACITY");
var array=[]
 var Total_exp_WR1=0
 var Total_exp_WR2=0
 var Total_exp_WR3=0
 var Total_exp_WR4=0
 var Total_exp_WR5=0
 var Total_exp_WR6=0
 var Total_exp_WR7=0
 var Total_exp_WR8=0
 var Total_exp_WR9=0
 var Total_exp_WR10=0
var Total_ACT_WR1 = 0
var Total_ACT_WR2 = 0
var Total_ACT_WR3 = 0
var Total_ACT_WR4=0
var Total_ACT_WR5=0
var Total_ACT_WR6=0
var Total_ACT_WR7=0
var Total_ACT_WR8=0
var Total_ACT_WR9=0
var Total_ACT_WR10=0
var Total_gen_loss_WR1=0
var Total_gen_loss_WR2 = 0
var Total_gen_loss_WR3 = 0
var Total_gen_loss_WR4=0
var Total_gen_loss_WR5=0
var Total_gen_loss_WR6=0
var Total_gen_loss_WR7=0
var Total_gen_loss_WR8=0
var Total_gen_loss_WR9=0
var Total_gen_loss_WR10 = 0
var obj
for (var i = 0; i < msg.payload.length; i++)
{  if(i<msg.payload.length){
    var DATE = msg.payload[i].date
    var WR_1_kwh = (msg.payload[i].WR1)/1000 
    var WR_1_Sp_Y = msg.payload[i]["Specific Yield_1(kWh / kWp)"] 
    var WR_2_kwh = (msg.payload[i].WR2)/1000 
    var WR_2_Sp_Y = msg.payload[i]["Specific Yield_2(kWh / kWp)"] 
    var WR_3_kwh = (msg.payload[i].WR3)/1000 
    var WR_3_Sp_Y = msg.payload[i]["Specific Yield_3(kWh / kWp)"] 
    var WR_4_kwh = (msg.payload[i].WR4)/1000 
    var WR_4_Sp_Y = msg.payload[i]["Specific Yield_4(kWh / kWp)"] 
    var WR_5_kwh = (msg.payload[i].WR5)/1000 
    var WR_5_Sp_Y = msg.payload[i]["Specific Yield_5(kWh / kWp)"] 
    var WR_6_kwh = (msg.payload[i].WR6)/1000 
    var WR_6_Sp_Y = msg.payload[i]["Specific Yield_6(kWh / kWp)"] 
    var WR_7_kwh = (msg.payload[i].WR7)/1000 
    var WR_7_Sp_Y = msg.payload[i]["Specific Yield_7(kWh / kWp)"] 
    var WR_8_kwh = (msg.payload[i].WR8)/1000 
    var WR_8_Sp_Y = msg.payload[i]["Specific Yield_8(kWh / kWp)"] 
    var WR_9_kwh = (msg.payload[i].WR9)/1000 
    var WR_9_Sp_Y = msg.payload[i]["Specific Yield_9(kWh / kWp)"] 
    var WR_10_kwh = (msg.payload[i].WR10)/1000 
    var WR_10_Sp_Y = msg.payload[i]["Specific Yield_10(kWh / kWp)"] 

    var Max_sy = Math.max(WR_1_Sp_Y || 0, WR_2_Sp_Y || 0, WR_2_Sp_Y || 0, WR_3_Sp_Y || 0, WR_4_Sp_Y || 0, WR_5_Sp_Y || 0, WR_6_Sp_Y || 0, WR_7_Sp_Y || 0, WR_8_Sp_Y || 0, WR_9_Sp_Y || 0, WR_10_Sp_Y || 0)

    var WR1_INV_CAPACITY=inv_cap[0]
    var WR2_INV_CAPACITY = inv_cap[1]
    var WR3_INV_CAPACITY = inv_cap[2]
    var WR4_INV_CAPACITY = inv_cap[3]
    var WR5_INV_CAPACITY = inv_cap[4]
    var WR6_INV_CAPACITY = inv_cap[5]
    var WR7_INV_CAPACITY = inv_cap[6]
    var WR8_INV_CAPACITY = inv_cap[7]
    var WR9_INV_CAPACITY = inv_cap[8]
    var WR10_INV_CAPACITY = inv_cap[9]

    var Expected_gen_WR1 = Max_sy * WR1_INV_CAPACITY
    var Expected_gen_WR2 =Max_sy * WR2_INV_CAPACITY
    var Expected_gen_WR3 = Max_sy * WR3_INV_CAPACITY
    var Expected_gen_WR4= Max_sy * WR4_INV_CAPACITY
    var Expected_gen_WR5= Max_sy * WR5_INV_CAPACITY
    var Expected_gen_WR6= Max_sy * WR6_INV_CAPACITY
    var Expected_gen_WR7= Max_sy * WR7_INV_CAPACITY
    var Expected_gen_WR8= Max_sy * WR8_INV_CAPACITY
    var Expected_gen_WR9= Max_sy * WR9_INV_CAPACITY
    var Expected_gen_WR10= Max_sy * WR10_INV_CAPACITY

    Total_exp_WR1 = Total_exp_WR1 + Expected_gen_WR1
    Total_exp_WR2 = Total_exp_WR2 + Expected_gen_WR2
    Total_exp_WR3 = Total_exp_WR3 + Expected_gen_WR3
    Total_exp_WR4 = Total_exp_WR4 + Expected_gen_WR4
    Total_exp_WR5 = Total_exp_WR5 + Expected_gen_WR5
    Total_exp_WR6 = Total_exp_WR6 + Expected_gen_WR6
    Total_exp_WR7 = Total_exp_WR7 + Expected_gen_WR7
    Total_exp_WR8 = Total_exp_WR8 + Expected_gen_WR8
    Total_exp_WR9 = Total_exp_WR9 + Expected_gen_WR9
    Total_exp_WR10= Total_exp_WR10 + Expected_gen_WR10

    Total_ACT_WR1 = Total_ACT_WR1 + WR_1_kwh
    Total_ACT_WR2 = Total_ACT_WR2 + WR_2_kwh
    Total_ACT_WR3 = Total_ACT_WR3 + WR_3_kwh
    Total_ACT_WR4 = Total_ACT_WR4 + WR_4_kwh
    Total_ACT_WR5 = Total_ACT_WR5 + WR_5_kwh
    Total_ACT_WR6 = Total_ACT_WR6 + WR_6_kwh
    Total_ACT_WR7 = Total_ACT_WR7 + WR_7_kwh
    Total_ACT_WR8 = Total_ACT_WR8 + WR_8_kwh
    Total_ACT_WR9 = Total_ACT_WR9 + WR_9_kwh
    Total_ACT_WR10 = Total_ACT_WR10 + WR_10_kwh
    
    if ((Expected_gen_WR1 != WR_1_kwh ) || (WR_1_kwh==0))
    { var GEN_LOSS_WR1 = (Expected_gen_WR1 - WR_1_kwh) } else { GEN_LOSS_WR1 = "0"}
    if ((Expected_gen_WR2 != WR_2_kwh) || (WR_2_kwh == 0))
    { var GEN_LOSS_WR2 = (Expected_gen_WR2 - WR_2_kwh) } else { GEN_LOSS_WR2 = "0" }
    if ((Expected_gen_WR3 != WR_3_kwh) || (WR_3_kwh == 0))
    { var GEN_LOSS_WR3 = (Expected_gen_WR3 - WR_3_kwh) } else { GEN_LOSS_WR3 = "0" }
    if ((Expected_gen_WR4 != WR_4_kwh) || (WR_4_kwh ==0))
    { var GEN_LOSS_WR4 = (Expected_gen_WR4 - WR_4_kwh) } else { GEN_LOSS_WR4 = "0" }
    if ((Expected_gen_WR5 != WR_5_kwh) || (WR_5_kwh ==0))
    { var GEN_LOSS_WR5 = (Expected_gen_WR5 - WR_5_kwh)} else { GEN_LOSS_WR5 = "0" }
    if ((Expected_gen_WR6 != WR_6_kwh) || (WR_6_kwh ==0))
    { var GEN_LOSS_WR6 = (Expected_gen_WR6 - WR_6_kwh) } else { GEN_LOSS_WR6 = "0" }
    if ((Expected_gen_WR7 != WR_7_kwh) || (WR_7_kwh ==0))
    { var GEN_LOSS_WR7 = (Expected_gen_WR7 - WR_7_kwh) } else { GEN_LOSS_WR7 = "0" }
    if ((Expected_gen_WR8 != WR_8_kwh) || (WR_8_kwh ==0))
    { var GEN_LOSS_WR8 = (Expected_gen_WR8 - WR_8_kwh) } else { GEN_LOSS_WR8 = "0" }
    if ((Expected_gen_WR9 != WR_9_kwh) || (WR_9_kwh ==0))
    { var GEN_LOSS_WR9 = (Expected_gen_WR9 - WR_9_kwh) } else { GEN_LOSS_WR9 = "0" }
    if ((Expected_gen_WR10 != WR_10_kwh) || (WR_10_kwh ==0))
    { var GEN_LOSS_WR10 = (Expected_gen_WR10 - WR_10_kwh) } else { GEN_LOSS_WR10 = "0" }

    Total_gen_loss_WR1 = Total_gen_loss_WR1 + (Expected_gen_WR1 - WR_1_kwh)
    Total_gen_loss_WR2 = Total_gen_loss_WR2 + (Expected_gen_WR2 - WR_2_kwh)
    Total_gen_loss_WR3 = Total_gen_loss_WR3 + (Expected_gen_WR3 - WR_3_kwh)
    Total_gen_loss_WR4 = Total_gen_loss_WR4 + (Expected_gen_WR4 - WR_4_kwh)
    Total_gen_loss_WR5 = Total_gen_loss_WR5 + (Expected_gen_WR5 - WR_5_kwh)
    Total_gen_loss_WR6 = Total_gen_loss_WR6 + (Expected_gen_WR6 - WR_6_kwh)
    Total_gen_loss_WR7 = Total_gen_loss_WR7 + (Expected_gen_WR7 - WR_7_kwh)
    Total_gen_loss_WR8 = Total_gen_loss_WR8 + (Expected_gen_WR8 - WR_8_kwh)
    Total_gen_loss_WR9 = Total_gen_loss_WR9 + (Expected_gen_WR9 - WR_9_kwh)
    Total_gen_loss_WR10 = Total_gen_loss_WR10 + (Expected_gen_WR10 - WR_10_kwh)


    var total_act_gen = [Total_ACT_WR1, Total_ACT_WR2, Total_ACT_WR3, Total_ACT_WR4 ,Total_ACT_WR5 ,Total_ACT_WR6 ,Total_ACT_WR7 ,Total_ACT_WR8 ,Total_ACT_WR9 ,Total_ACT_WR10]
    var total_exp_gen = [Total_exp_WR1, Total_exp_WR2, Total_exp_WR3,Total_exp_WR4 ,Total_exp_WR5 ,Total_exp_WR6 ,Total_exp_WR7 ,Total_exp_WR8 ,Total_exp_WR9 ,Total_exp_WR10]
    var totalgen_loss = [Total_gen_loss_WR1, Total_gen_loss_WR2,Total_gen_loss_WR3 ,Total_gen_loss_WR4 ,Total_gen_loss_WR5 ,Total_gen_loss_WR6 ,Total_gen_loss_WR7 ,Total_gen_loss_WR8 ,Total_gen_loss_WR9 ,Total_gen_loss_WR10]


    obj = {
        DATE,
         WR_1_kwh,
         WR_1_Sp_Y,
         WR_2_kwh,
         WR_2_Sp_Y,
         WR_3_kwh,
         WR_3_Sp_Y,
         WR_4_kwh,
         WR_4_Sp_Y,
         WR_5_kwh,
         WR_5_Sp_Y,
         WR_6_kwh,
         WR_6_Sp_Y,
         WR_7_kwh,
         WR_7_Sp_Y,
         WR_8_kwh,
         WR_8_Sp_Y,
         WR_9_kwh,
         WR_9_Sp_Y,
         WR_10_kwh,
         WR_10_Sp_Y,
         Max_sy,
        Expected_gen_WR1,
        Expected_gen_WR2,
        Expected_gen_WR3,
        Expected_gen_WR4,
        Expected_gen_WR5,
        Expected_gen_WR6,
        Expected_gen_WR7,
        Expected_gen_WR8,
        Expected_gen_WR9,
        Expected_gen_WR10,
        GEN_LOSS_WR1,
        GEN_LOSS_WR2,
        GEN_LOSS_WR3,
        GEN_LOSS_WR4,
        GEN_LOSS_WR5,
        GEN_LOSS_WR6,
        GEN_LOSS_WR7,
        GEN_LOSS_WR8,
        GEN_LOSS_WR9,
        GEN_LOSS_WR10,
    }
}
   /* if (i == msg.payload.length) {
        obj = {
            DATE: "null" + '\n' +"TOTAL","WR 1 (kWh)": "null" + '\n' + Total_ACT_WR1, "Specific Yield (kWh / kWp)": "null" + '\n' + "null", "WR 2 (kWh)": "null" + '\n' + Total_ACT_WR2, "Specific Yield2 (kWh / kWp)": "null" + '\n' + "null", "Total Yield Wh": "null" + '\n' + "null", "average specific yield (kWh / kWp)": "null" + '\n' + "null", "Max_sy": "null", "Expected_gen_WR1": "null" + '\n' + Total_exp_WR1.toFixed(2), "Expected_gen_WR2": "null" + '\n' + Total_exp_WR2.toFixed(2), "GEN_LOSS_WR1": "null" + '\n' + Total_gen_loss_WR1.toFixed(2), "GEN_LOSS_WR2": "null" + '\n' + Total_gen_loss_WR2.toFixed(2)
        }
    }*/

    array.push(obj)
    
}
flow.set("out", array);
flow.set("totalgen_loss",totalgen_loss)
flow.set("total_act_gen",total_act_gen)
flow.set("total_exp_gen", total_exp_gen)

msg.payload=array
return msg;
